dt1.1:0.2_0: recitation passage for recitation, and answer.
dt1.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
dt1.1:11.1_0: bound together with his army of fat,
dt1.1:13.1_0: Accomplished in the lower part of the body,
dt1.1:14.1_0: Not fixed, always committed to Gotama,
